GOVERNMENT OF INDIA

A’ WING JANPATH BHAWAN 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI 
Dated:         08 /08/2011 
 
 
AVSEC ORDER NO.  24/2011 
 
 
 
Subject:   Random Screening at the entry gate  to Terminal Building. . 
 
 
 
 
Commissioner of Security (Civil Aviation), Bureau of Civil 
Aviation Security, in exercise of powers conferred by Section 5A of 
Aircraft Act 1934 delegated to him vide Government of India, Ministry 
of Civil Aviation Notification No. 1797 dated July 3, 1997 for the purpose 
of securing the safety of aircraft operation directs that the following 
screening equipment shall be installed/provided  by the Airport 
Operator concerned for random screening at the entry gate to Terminal 
Building : 
 
Up to 03 gates   
:  
One X-BIS, 02 HHMD, 01 DFMD & 01 ETD 
 
06 gates & above  :  
Two sets of above equipments  shall be         
provided.  
 
 
2. 
This Order is issued with the approval of Commissioner of 
Security (CA) violation of which shall attract legal action under Sec. 11A 
of Aircraft Act 1934. 
 
 
 
 
 
 ( B.B Dash, IPS )  
Joint Commissioner of Security (CA)
